pci_app_add_review_price_resource_free: Resources offered by OVHcloud during the beta testing phase
pci_app_add_review_resources: Model and number of resources per replica
pci_app_add_review_license_voxist_info_1: The partner license is calculated according to the duration of the file to be transcribed. This duration may be different from the duration for which the selected resources are used.
pci_app_add_review_license_voxist_info_2: Price applicable up to 100,000 transcribed minutes. The prices applicable beyond this threshold are available via the following link:
pci_app_add_review_total_price_voxist_in: Price applicable only for 1 hour of usage for the selected resources and 1 hour of usage of the partner license.
